levels.description: Stops attacking, binds up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies within range, and deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to bound enemies every second; when skill is active, gradually consumes <@ba.vup>{cost_display}</> DP
